privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: SULaunchKit ("we") offers software development services. We collect certain information to operate and improve our products and comply with legal obligations. We prioritize data minimization and the use of aggregated or pseudonymized data when possible.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: We only collect data necessary to provide our services and improve your experience.
dataCollection.personal: Personal information you provide (name, company, email, phone) when contacting us or creating an account.
dataCollection.usage: Product usage data and analytics (feature usage, API call metrics, error reports) used to improve reliability and performance.
dataCollection.technical: Technical data (IP address, device and browser information, cookies and logs) necessary for security, debugging and analysis.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Data
dataUsage.content: We use collected data to operate the service, provide customer support, secure our systems, bill customers and measure product performance. We do not sell personal information to third parties.

sharing.title: Sharing and Third Parties
sharing.content: We share data with trusted service providers (hosting, analytics, payment processors) under contracts that limit their use. We may share data when required by law or to protect our rights.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard technical, administrative and physical safeguards to protect personal information, including TLS for data in transit and encrypted storage for sensitive fields when appropriate. No system is completely secure; report concerns to our security contact.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain personal information only as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes. Aggregated analytics may be retained longer to improve the product.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, rectify, delete or export your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights; we will respond according to applicable law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For privacy questions or to exercise data rights, write to hello@sulaunchkit.com or use the contact form on our site.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using SULaunchKit services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Description of Service
services.content: SULaunchKit provides custom software development services, including but not limited to web applications, mobile applications, and technology consulting.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: As a user of our services, you agree to:
responsibilities.legal: Use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
responsibilities.accurate: Provide accurate and complete information when requested.
responsibilities.security: Maintain the security of your account and promptly notify us of any unauthorized use.
responsibilities.prohibited: Not engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts our services.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of SULaunchKit and its licensors. Custom solutions developed for clients will follow ownership terms specified in individual service agreements.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall SULaunchKit, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@sulaunchkit.com.
